00010 #define KEY_DOWN                                                  0x0001

00124 // NOTE: this may not be the absolute most-latest current mouse co-ordinates, use GetCursorPos for that
00125 #define _gusMouseInside(x1,y1,x2,y2)   ((gusMouseXPos >= x1) && (gusMouseXPos <= x2) && (gusMouseYPos >= y1) && (gusMouseYPos <= y2))

00127 #define _EvType(a)         ((InputAtom *)(a))->usEvent
00128 #define _EvTimeStamp(a)    ((InputAtom *)(a))->uiTimeStamp
00129 #define _EvKey(a)          ((InputAtom *)(a))->usParam
00130 #define _EvMouseX(a)       (UINT16)(((InputAtom *)(a))->uiParam & 0x0000ffff)
00131 #define _EvMouseY(a)       (UINT16)((((InputAtom *)(a))->uiParam & 0xffff0000) >> 16)
00132 #define _EvShiftDown(a)    (((InputAtom *)(a))->usKeyState & SHIFT_DOWN)
00133 #define _EvCtrlDown(a)     (((InputAtom *)(a))->usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN)
